Package eu.ehri.project.commands

Interface Summary
Command  
 

Class Summary
BaseCommand  
Check Sanity check various parts of the graph.
CmdEntryPoint Entry point for launching admin commands.
CountryAdd Add a country.
DcImport Import EAD from the command line...
DeleteEntities Delete an entire class of stuff via the command line.
EacImport  
EadAsVirtualCollectionImport Import EAD from the command line...
EadImport Import EAD from the command line...
EagImport  
EntityAdd Add a user.
EntityDelete Delete an entire class of stuff via the command line.
GetEntity Import EAD from the command line...
GraphML IMPORTANT! This command is currently not available since GraphML dumps are broken with the EHRI DB since we use array properties which do not save/load correctly.
GraphSON Dump the complete graph as graphSON file, or import such a dump

Example usage: - stop the server $NEO4J_HOME/bin/neo4j stop - save a dump ./scripts/cmd graphson -d out graph.json or ./scripts/cmd graphson -d out - > graph.json - edit it - remove the graph rm -rf $NEO4J_HOME/data/graph.db - load edited graph ./scripts/cmd graphson -d in graph.json - start server $NEO4J_HOME/bin/neo4j start
GraphViz Dump a particular subgraph as a DOT file.
IcaAtomEadImport Import EAD from the command line...
ImportCommand  
ImportCsvCommand  
Initialize Import EAD from the command line...
ListEntities Import EAD from the command line...
LoadFixtures Import EAD from the command line...
PersonalitiesImport  
RdfExport Export to RDF.
Reindex Import EAD from the command line...
RelationAdd Add an arbitrary edge between two nodes.
SkosVocabularyImport Import Skos from the command line...
UserAdd Add a user.
UserListEntities Import EAD from the command line...
UserMod Add a user.
UshmmEadImport Import command for USHMM EAD files.
